DeliveryBoy.title: DeliveryBoy
DeliveryBoy.description: Represents a delivery boy in the system.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the delivery boy was added.

DeliveryRecord.title: DeliveryRecord
DeliveryRecord.description: Represents a daily delivery record for a delivery boy.

delivered_bhilai3.description: Number of parcels delivered in Bhilai-3.

returned_bhilai3.description: Number of parcels returned in Bhilai-3.

delivered_charoda.description: Number of parcels delivered in Charoda.

returned_charoda.description: Number of parcels returned in Charoda.

rvp.description: Number of RVP (Return to Vendor Pickup) pickups.

AdvancePayment.title: AdvancePayment
AdvancePayment.description: Represents a separate advance payment to a delivery boy.

deliveryBoyName.description: Name of the delivery boy receiving the advance.

CompanyCodPayment.title: CompanyCodPayment
CompanyCodPayment.description: Represents a COD amount paid to the main company.

date.description: Date of the payment to the company.

/delivery_records/{recordId}.description: Stores all delivery records from all delivery boys.

/advance_payments/{paymentId}.description: Stores all separate advance payments made.

/delivery_boys/{boyId}.description: Stores the list of all delivery boys.

/company_cod_payments/{paymentId}.description: Stores all COD payments made to the company.
